metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3669 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Axiomatic Bento4 and classified as problematic. This issue affects the function AP4_AvccAtom::Create of the component mp4edit. The manipulation leads to memory leak. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-212009 was assigned to this vulnerability.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
